vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κυκλόθεν,
adverb from all around, κ. ὁδὸς περίχει [NT+5th c.BC+], and sometimes in codices, but this spelling is condemned by [Refs 9th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(all) around; from all sides
all around, round about, Rev. 4:3, 4, 8*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1) prep. con gen. alrededor, por todas partes; (2) adv. alrededor, por todos lados
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 在....四圍 (啟 4:8)
2) 圍繞成圈
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 在....四围 (启 4:8)
2) 围绕成圈
